title: Lee Seob’s love
summary:
In his entire life, Lee Seop pursued to become a capable heir of the number one firm in Korea, TK Group. But his efforts were in jeopardy when a genius man manages to take control of the core business in the firm. Frustrated with his own incapabilities, he planned to retaliate in a nonsensical way. Meanwhile, Mikyeong, a top elite in the firm was assigned to work with him.

Note: This series is the spin-off sequel to the novel, 태연한 거짓말 which featured Junseop (Iseop's cousin) as the protagonist.

---

From Webtoon:
With her outstanding business acumen, Mingyeong Kang climbed the corporate ranks of TK Group, Korea’s top conglomerate, to become a senior manager in record time. But after 10 years at the company, she’s been assigned to be the secretary of Iseop Tae, the successor to TK Group. The two entered the company at the same time, but ever since he came second place to her at new employee training, Iseop’s never taken kindly to Mingyeong. She’s better than him in every way and trampled all over his ego… so why can’t he stop thinking about her?

title: The Substitute Adopted Daughter is Finally Free!
Max Talent Player
summary: In 2018, monsters swarmed Seoul, and heroic “players” saved the city. Fast forward a decade, Hyukjin Kim, stuck in a seven-year rut after failing to become a player himself, gets a do-over. Zapped back to 2018, Hyukjin seizes his chance to rewrite history. With knowledge from the future and his re-awakened player talents, Hyukjin battles beasts and conquers dungeons in a pulse-pounding quest for redemption and survival!

title: Academy’s Undercover Professor
summary:
Machiavelli and Gerrard are just one of the many names the new professor of Ceoren Academy uses to disguise his identity - and now he can add one more to his list, Professor Ludger Cherish. 

The real Ludger Cherish dies on board a train during a terrorist attack, making him the perfect target for a new identity. Little does the new professor know, Ludger Cherish was involved in something deep and secret. 

The new Professor Ludger has to be careful to not get caught by the school and the dangerous secret society.

title: I’m a Solo Guide
summary:
Kang Jinhyeok, a gaming streamer and content creator, is the only person who has cleared the game, [Tower of Trials]. However, as the game’s popularity declines, it becomes increasingly difficult for him to continue making a living as a content creator. 

Jinhyeok prepares to end his 11-year-long relationship with the game and say goodbye to his humble group of subscribers. But on that very day, the Tower of Trials appears in reality with a message saying that humanity will perish unless all players clear each floor within 90 days.

Jinhyeok, who knows the game better than anyone, decides to use his knowledge to his advantage and dominate the tower.

title: Savage Castle
summary: Due to his uncle's conspiracy, the king leaves the throne and hides in a desolate land. The story unfolds with the king and a pitiful yet beautiful noble lady, who has made him her slave, entangled in obsession and affection.

title: The Young Wife
summary: I possessed the body of the distant ancestor of the male lead in a martial arts novel where he dominates everything. To faithfully fulfill my role of supporting him, I worked myself to the bone and established the greatest family. After that, I peacefully closed my eyes. "What? My family has collapsed?!" When I opened my eyes again, 300 years had passed. The family I had painstakingly built was on the brink of ruin. On top of that, the male lead I dedicated my life to cheering for was about to enter a humiliating political marriage with the villainess from the original story. But the biggest problem was... "Why did I become that villainess!"

title: Secretly Meeting With My Boss
summary: Hashimoto is your average office worker—young, and prone to being pushed around by his demon boss, Shirase. His only escape is his favorite online game, and the friends he’s made within. But when he plans an offline meetup for his party, he gets the surprise of his life…! [Kodansha]

title: The Grim Reaper Duke’s Obsessive Contract Mother
13th Prince
summary:
The strongest female assassin from a special assassination force met her death one day on a mission. To her surprise, she woke up in the body of a 13 year old girl, Mu Rong Liu Yue. Through Liu Yue's past memories, she found out that she was bullied due to the huge birthmark on her face, even though she came from a renowned family.  
  
LLS: The hiatus that the author took has been almost a year already… 100% its done. Sorry guys

title: I Obtained a Mythic Item
summary:
In a world where technology and magic are almost indistinguishable from one another, monsters and creatures of myth and legend reign terror upon mankind. In humanity’s darkest moment, individuals with special god-like powers emerge to save the day. They are — the Awakened.

Meet Jaehyeon, a feeble Awakened human Raider, who struggles to make ends meet until one day a series of confounding events allow him to claim a powerful item that will change the course of history forever…

title: Reincarnator
summary:
There was an inn with an urban legend among adventurers. "The Inn that won't let you die if you stay there."  
  
Loretta arrives at the inn as part of her quest. What is the secret of the "Deathless Inn?"  
  
"Save Point."  
  
It was an inn ran by an maxed out adventurer with the ability to create "Save Points" who came from another world. He retired from being an adventurer and decided to run an inn, while training newbie adventurers. Loretta, who needs to become strong, will be trained by the innkeeper, Alexander.  
  
If you die, don't worry about it, just hit load!  
  
  
**TL;DR**:   
Isekai + RPG Save Points + POV of a Native instead of the OP Otherworlder  


---

**WN Series Raw (12 different works)**:   
<https://ncode.syosetu.com/s1747d/>

title: Reborn as a Demonic Cultivator: Starting with a Zombie Planet
summary: Chu Xuan traveled through the Cangxuan world and became a demon cultivator of Wuji Sect. The so-called demon cultivation is to plunder the essence of heaven and earth and seize the essence of all things. After slaughtering thousands of people, he became the Great Demon Lord. However, killing is not tolerated by the heavenly way of the human race. Wuji Sect was also destroyed by the righteous sect. When he was helpless, Chu Xuan accidentally got the blood mirror, which could take him to a doomsday planet full of zombies! He suddenly discovered that this place is simply a paradise for demon cultivators!

title: Boundless Necromancer
summary:
[The Tower of Trials has selected all suitable candidates from Earth.  Please select your difficulty.]

Seong-yun Han was just a boy when his parents were killed by monsters unleashed during a mysterious calamity called the “Dungeon Break.”

Seven years later, Seong-yun is devastated to find that his grinding efforts to become a Hunter, fierce warriors who seek out and destroy monsters, are entirely in vain, as his fighting attributes have not increased at all.

Seong-yun’s world flips on a dime when he accepts an invitation to join the Tower of Trials, an otherworldly realm where challengers must overcome trials that pit them against monsters and humans alike!

title: The Demon Lord Hates Reverse Harem
In an Attempt to Get Revenge, I Seduced My Husband
The S-Class Dungeon Owner
summary:
Shin Yoori, South Korea’s very first S-Rank Hunter and the leader of the most elite Hunter Team, ventures into a dungeon for the anticipated challenge of clearing an L-Rank gate, known to be extremely difficult.

Entering a role-playing dungeon that’s set in a Romantic Fantasy world, Shin Yoori unexpectedly finds herself possessing a frail young lady. While her teammates possess dazzling characters, why is she the only one…?!

Struggling with a body that quickly loses stamina just by walking, Shin Yoori wonders why she is the only one suffering from these difficulties…!

Will they clear this dungeon with their sanity intact, despite the unexpected twists and challenges that they’ll face?

title: Marriage Escape
summary:
Burned out from work, Yeonseul’s long-awaited vacation takes a disastrous turn when she finds herself stranded on an island. Her only company? A maddeningly handsome stranger, infuriating as he is irresistible–but with survival forcing them together, sparks fly and an impulsive marriage marked by a night neither can forget transforms their relationship into something rather intimate. But as rescue brings an end to their rendezvous, Yeonseul reluctantly resigns herself to the end of her castaway romance–except her island husband doesn’t want to, their love story far from over.

----
*Note: The English adaptation is R15. The original work is R19.*

title: The Immoral Ducal Family Needs to Learn Family Values
The Business Is Closed Due To The Tyrant Parents
Gold Hands
summary: I'm just his personal caretaker, or is there something more…?

title: Myst, Might, Mayhem
summary: All Jeong wants is a second chance -- for revenge! His grandfather’s gruesome death has transformed him into the bloodthirsty and ruthless Scythe Demon. He will stop at nothing until he has killed the man responsible. Yet rage and determination alone are not enough. He must train in martial arts if he ever wants to stand a chance against such a formidable foe. Will he succeed in his revenge on the murderer of his grandfather?

title: Estio
summary:
"Are you the one who called me…?"

A black-haired beast looked at him with glowing yellow eyes.

"It’s okay. It won't hurt anymore. You'll be okay."

Estio was born as the youngest son of a farmer, but everyone hated him. He was a child who could read the hearts of people and animals. And…

"A cursed child."

He finally turned 19, and it was now time for his coming-of-age ceremony. Now starts Estio's journey to find happiness.

---
Estio is just an ordinary farmer's son, but with an extraordinary ability-he can read the thoughts and memories of humans and animals. For this, he is shunned by the people in his village, finding happiness only in his animal friends. After years of silently enduring the villagers' hostility, Estio runs away the night he turns 19. His journey brings unexpected friendships and encounters, but will such bonds be able to show him there is more to him and his ability than meets the eye?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%90%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0%EC%98%A4/2761), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58509736)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/estio/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/96041)

title: The Reset Life of a Game Addict
summary:
Jinho Lee has just completed the ultimate challenge in the game Reset Life, where he had to experience all 99 possible endings to reach the final victory. After six years of intense gameplay, he feels a sense of achievement—but also an overwhelming emptiness. With nothing left to conquer in the game, Jinho finds himself at a loss, unsure of what to do next.

However, this feeling of burnout becomes the catalyst for an even greater transformation. Suddenly, Jinho’s life is reset in ways he never imagined—he becomes the top scorer in the nation, a model, a chef, and even a celebrity. What once seemed like distant dreams are now his new reality. But with this newfound success comes the question: is this truly the life he wanted?

title: Dangerous Office Romance
summary:
Raised by conservative educator parents, Jisoo could never dream of straying far from their high moral standards. 
However, there was that one time when she had a passionate one-night stand with a cute stranger she met while clubbing with her friends.
To her great surprise, she runs into him five years later as her company's newly appointed CEO!

title: Senior is Bad!
summary:
Komi-san is a beautiful and admirable girl that no one can take their eyes off of. Almost the whole school sees her as the cold beauty that's out of their league, but Tadano Hitohito knows the truth: she's just really bad at communicating with others.

Komi-san, who wishes to fix this bad habit of hers, tries to improve it with the help of Tadano-kun by achieving her goal of having 100 friends.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [VIZ Manga Chapters](https://www.viz.com/vizmanga/chapters/komi-cant-communicate)

title: Father, I Won’t Do Anything
summary: Jayna’s life is a parade of misfortunes: born to a dragon mother who dies early, bullied by other dragons throughout her childhood, disregarded by her human father, and murdered as a teenager. At least, according to the novel she’s been reborn in. At 10 years old, she’s given the chance to live with her father, the Master of the Magic Tower, Diamid. She’s aware her father and destiny will not be kind to her, so her only goal is to enjoy the small luxuries of life until she dies at 17. But will this life truly be the same tragedy?

title: Father, I Won’t Do Anything (Manhwa)
summary: Jayna’s life is a parade of misfortunes: born to a dragon mother who dies early, bullied by other dragons throughout her childhood, disregarded by her human father, and murdered as a teenager. At least, according to the novel she’s been reborn in. At 10 years old, she’s given the chance to live with her father, the Master of the Magic Tower, Diamid. She’s aware her father and destiny will not be kind to her, so her only goal is to enjoy the small luxuries of life until she dies at 17. But will this life truly be the same tragedy?

title: Deadly Strong
summary: In his previous life, Su Ye stood as the last survivor amidst the world’s ultimate cataclysmic battle, a poignant witness to the downfall of humanity. However, after his demise, he inexplicably awoke to find himself reborn ten years into the past. Faced with impending and unparalleled challenges, he is resolute in his determination to lead everyone to triumph!

title: My Dead Lover Returned as a Tyrant
MOONLIGHT LIBRARY
summary:
In an empire where women are forbidden from learning the ancient language, Luna cross-dresses as "Lou" to work as an ancient language translator. Sure, her actions are punishable by death, but what haunts her more are the depressing details of her future self's diary from the mysterious library in her dreams. Making money as a translator is the fastest way she can leave her uncaring uncle's house and change her dismal future.

However, Luna's main client happens to be her cousin's fiance, Duke Rothenbern, who gets drugged with a potent love potion and needs her "assistance" detoxifying it...

title: The Consequences of Messing with the Original Work
summary:
You know, sometimes you just gotta do what you gotta do to survive. Getting hit in the head with a liquor bottle? Yeah, no thanks. If booting my deadbeat dad to the curb is what it takes, then so be it. Who cares about being the 'good' daughter when your skull's not intact?

And honestly, this whole 'rebuilding the family and getting back home' plan? It started with a bit of divine intervention, or so they say about that land. Next thing I know, bam! I became Countess Validus, blessed by the gods and apparently a real estate mogul.

Then the "just trying to make my life easier" snowball started. A little business here, a tiny push towards the Magic Tower there (hey, free research!), pointing out a few flaws in some laws (someone had to!), maybe tossing a sponsorship bone or two (art can be an investment, right?), and... why not, a school? Knowledge is power, and all that jazz.

The thing is, I wasn't exactly expecting a fan club to spring up. My staff acts like I hung the moon. Then this one lord suddenly wants to be my shadow, apparently my word is gospel now, and someone even called me the hope of the nation! And the proposals? Don't even get me started. All I did was try to not get hit in the head again and maybe, just maybe, find a way back to my own couch. Why is everyone acting like I'm some kind of saint? It's beyond me.

title: Subscribing To The Transcendent’s Channel
summary:
Living by selling information about monsters, Maeng Siwoo is considered completely useless in the hunter industry without any standout qualities. However, he fiercely battles to provide for his sick younger sibling.

One fateful day, he is gifted a mysterious smartphone by a transcendent being within a dungeon, appointing him as the channel manager for such beings. Upon subscribing to the channel, he unlocks the ability to wield the powers of the gods.

title: Trapped in a Crazy World as an Extra
summary:
The Chronicles of the Seven-Colored World  a series that ran for over 800 episodes and earned its fair share of curses from readers. A batshit crazy world full of absurd plot twists, endlessly evolving monsters, and heroines who try to kill the protagonist at every turn.

"And I got reincarnated into this mess?"

I’ve ended up as a nobody named Rudian — a total background character.

But with a freaky eyeball monster I happened to pick up, Adi, and a demonic sword called Diablo by my side, I’ve decided to take over this insane world.

Time to dive into some true chaotic gameplay!

title: Dungeon Reset
summary: Dawoon's ordinary life is turned upside down when he is summoned into the Dungeon, where he must play a deadly game, outlasting dangerous monsters and life-threatening traps. To make matters worse, he's only a mere crafter with zero combat abilities. But after Dawoon falls into a trap and survives after a glitched reset, he's gained random but oddly helpful skills. He'll need to get creative to clear the game and return home, with a bloodthirsty assistant and an adorable ground squirrel along for the ride. Now that the rules no longer apply to him, what possibilities await in the tunnels below.

title: Unshakable Female Lead in Regret Genre
Vengeance from a Saint Full of Wounds
summary: Lua, a candidate saint with healing powers. However, her abilities were flawed, and she would be pained and painful to herself in order to transfer the symptoms to herself and heal them. The saintly candidates treated her as a flaw, but only her best friend Ariane was always there. One day, Garrot, the Knight Commander whom Lua cares about, is dying. After completely healing his wounds, Lua wanders between life and death at the limit of her abilities. However, when he awoke, all the credit belonged to Ariane, and Garrot and Arian's engagement had been decided. Seeing Arian's true nature, he is coldly beaten by Garrot. In despair, Lua vowed not to heal anyone anymore. Then the Second Prince Swen asks, "Why don't you take revenge on those who have demeaned you?" She uses another ability she has been hiding – the atrocious ability to inflict healing symptoms on others – and joins forces with Swen to start a new life as an "evil woman" instead of a "saint."

title: Resetting Lady
summary:
I entered the world of a novel suddenly. I thought that I could return to reality by falling in love, but death was what awaited me in the end. Defenestration, strangulation, poisoning, drowning, and burning to death... Even after dying a hundred times and returning, the novel still doesn't end...

Karen Haier, who greets her 117th birthday trapped within a novel, now decides to become a murderer.

title: Magic Lord
summary: A man was reincarnated as Van, a boy of noble birth, who grew up to become a child prodigy through hard work. But when it was discovered that he possessed "production magic," he was immediately relegated to a remote village. However, his magic, which was called useless, turned out to be truly extraordinary, capable of producing anything as long as he had the right ingredients! With the knowledge from his previous life and the overpowered magic, the small, poor village will grow to become into a great city.

title: Don’t Mess with a Deadly Revenger [Official]
You Can Hear It
summary:
There was an inn with an urban legend among adventurers. "The Inn that won't let you die if you stay there."  
  
Loretta arrives at the inn as part of her quest. What is the secret of the "Deathless Inn?"  
  
"Save Point."  
  
It was an inn ran by an maxed out adventurer with the ability to create "Save Points" who came from another world. He retired from being an adventurer and decided to run an inn, while training newbie adventurers. Loretta, who needs to become strong, will be trained by the innkeeper, Alexander.  
  
If you die, don't worry about it, just hit load!  
  
  
**TL;DR**:   
Isekai + RPG Save Points + POV of a Native instead of the OP Otherworlder

**WN Series Raw (12 different works)**:   
<https://ncode.syosetu.com/s1747d/>

title: The Promise Isn’t Mine
summary:
"Kill me, as you promised." 

When her twin sister Leyla, the Holy Maiden, suddenly disappears one day, the ordinary Elena finds herself having to marry Crown Prince Kyle, a man infamous for his ruthlessness, in her stead. After a dreadful marriage ceremony, Kyle demands that a certain promise be fulfilled, to Elena’s confusion.

title: Die Melusine
summary:
My serenade, my Kieron. 
During one of his conquests, the heartless Archduke Kieron discovers Melusine, a mermaid in captivity. Their bond deepens, but according to legend, mermaids must kill their lovers to return to the sea. Melusine cannot bear to harm Kieron and leaves instead. What cruel fate awaits the lovers?

title: In the Doghouse
summary: The Devon family sits on a mountain of debt and they are on the brink of bankruptcy. This is no fault of hers of course, but Courtney Devon has always been the one painted as the villain in her family. However, the family is in dire straits and they have to do something, anything, to raise some money and get out of this situation. But then one day, news arrives from the Imperial Palace that His Royal Highness the crown prince has decided to make Courtney the crown princess. Seemingly a typical prince on the outside, His Royal Highness is actually quite a troublemaker with a dark side. Will this arrangement end up solving Courtney Devon’s problems or just complicating things further? Will a love against all odds bloom or will someone end up in the doghouse...?

title: The Indomitable Martial King
summary:
In a world where humans enslave non-human species, the powerful wizard Leppenhardt creates an empire to safeguard these beings. However, his reign ends when he's defeated by the brutally strong Tesron, the "King of Fists." 

But death isn’t the end, because Leppenhardt awakens in Tesron's young body! 

Now armed with incredible strength and a new identity, he sets off to free the non-human races again. Can the new King of Fists reshape the world for all, or will his second chance slip away?
